10 Great Olms

Summon Units:#2528 Great Olm x 10
The caster contacts the Great Olms of the deeper earth, once allied to the Oracles of Agartha, and persuades them to hold a conclave. A dozen Great Olms led by an Olm Sage gather and are coerced into aiding the mage and the awakening God of Agartha.
